title: ISic000328. I.Sicily inscription 000328
body:
Facsimile Images

T(itus) ((·)) Ani[---]
T(itus) ((·)) Aelius [---]
C(aius) ((·)) Iulius ((·)) Dio[---]
Ti(berius) ((·)) Claudius ((·)) Ce[---]
5C(aius) ((·)) Iulius ((·)) Pr[---]
PAISV[---]

Apparatus criticus

Text of Mommsen (from autopsy); Amico: DIOP...
4: Amico: CEI...
6: Amico: CRASSVS...

translation

commentary

Manganaro and Korhonen suggest that this might be a list of officials; Amico assumed it to be a list of those buried in a tomb and so funerary, since the area of its discovery is more broadly that of the necropolis.

bibliography

  • Amico 1741 224 no. 28 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002186
  • Castelli 1769 cl. XVIII no. 47 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002084
  • Castelli 1784 cl. XVIII no. 48 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002083
  • 10.7044 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000589
  • Manganaro 1988 43 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001427
  • Korhonen 2004 p. 71 n. 9 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000028
